trans-unit.source: Trains a clustering model and assigns data from the training set to clusters
trans-unit.target: Trains a clustering model and assigns data from the training set to clusters

trans-unit.source: The <ui>Train Clustering Model</ui> module takes an untrained clustering model, such as that produced by <link xlink:href="5049a09b-bd90-4c4e-9b46-7c87e3a36810" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">K-Means</link>, and an unlabeled data set.
trans-unit.target: The <ui>Train Clustering Model</ui> module takes an untrained clustering model, such as that produced by <link xlink:href="5049a09b-bd90-4c4e-9b46-7c87e3a36810" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">K-Means</link>, and an unlabeled data set.

trans-unit.source: It builds a clustering model using the specified configuration and returns the training data, together with a cluster assignment for each case in training data.
trans-unit.target: It builds a clustering model using the specified configuration and returns the training data, together with a cluster assignment for each case in training data.

trans-unit.source: You can then use the training model to predict cluster membership for new cases, using the <link xlink:href="eed3ee76-e8aa-46e6-907c-9ca767f5c114" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Assign to clusters</link> module.
trans-unit.target: You can then use the training model to predict cluster membership for new cases, using the <link xlink:href="eed3ee76-e8aa-46e6-907c-9ca767f5c114" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Assign to clusters</link> module.

trans-unit.source: Note that <ui>Train Clustering Model</ui> works a bit differently from <link xlink:href="5cc7053e-aa30-450d-96c0-dae4be720977" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">train Model</link>, which is the generic module for creating trained machine learning models.
trans-unit.target: Note that <ui>Train Clustering Model</ui> works a bit differently from <link xlink:href="5cc7053e-aa30-450d-96c0-dae4be720977" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">train Model</link>, which is the generic module for creating trained machine learning models.

trans-unit.source: That is because <link xlink:href="5cc7053e-aa30-450d-96c0-dae4be720977" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">train Model</link> works only with supervised learning algorithms – that is, algorithms that require a sample of data with known labels to train from.
trans-unit.target: That is because <link xlink:href="5cc7053e-aa30-450d-96c0-dae4be720977" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">train Model</link> works only with supervised learning algorithms – that is, algorithms that require a sample of data with known labels to train from.

trans-unit.source: In contrast, K-means and other clustering algorithms are unsupervised machine learning algorithms, meaning that you can let the algorithm learn from new data without having to provide it with examples.
trans-unit.target: In contrast, K-means and other clustering algorithms are unsupervised machine learning algorithms, meaning that you can let the algorithm learn from new data without having to provide it with examples.

trans-unit.source: For an example of how clustering is used in machine learning, see these sample experiments in the <externalLink><linkText>Model Gallery</linkText><linkUri>http://gallery.azureml.net/</linkUri></externalLink>:
trans-unit.target: For an example of how clustering is used in machine learning, see these sample experiments in the <externalLink><linkText>Model Gallery</linkText><linkUri>http://gallery.azureml.net/</linkUri></externalLink>:

trans-unit.source: The <externalLink><linkText>Clustering: Find similar Companies</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=525164</linkUri></externalLink> sample demonstrates how to use clustering on attributes derived from unstructured text.
trans-unit.target: The <externalLink><linkText>Clustering: Find similar Companies</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=525164</linkUri></externalLink> sample demonstrates how to use clustering on attributes derived from unstructured text.

trans-unit.source: The <externalLink><linkText>Clustering: Color quantization</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=525272</linkUri></externalLink> sample demonstrates how to use clustering to find related colors and reduce the number of bits used in images.
trans-unit.target: The <externalLink><linkText>Clustering: Color quantization</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=525272</linkUri></externalLink> sample demonstrates how to use clustering to find related colors and reduce the number of bits used in images.

trans-unit.source: The <externalLink><linkText>Clustering: Group iris data</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=526317</linkUri></externalLink> sample provides a simple example of clustering based on the iris dataset.
trans-unit.target: The <externalLink><linkText>Clustering: Group iris data</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=526317</linkUri></externalLink> sample provides a simple example of clustering based on the iris dataset.

trans-unit.source: If there are any duplicate names when the new column is being appended to dataset, a numeric suffix (such as "(2)", "(3)" and so forth) is added to the name of the new column.
trans-unit.target: If there are any duplicate names when the new column is being appended to dataset, a numeric suffix (such as "(2)", "(3)" and so forth) is added to the name of the new column.

trans-unit.source: Check for Append or Uncheck for Result Only
trans-unit.target: Check for Append or Uncheck for Result Only

trans-unit.source: Whether output dataset must contain input dataset appended by assignments column (Checked) or assignments column only (Unchecked)
trans-unit.target: Whether output dataset must contain input dataset appended by assignments column (Checked) or assignments column only (Unchecked)

trans-unit.source: Input dataset appended by data column of assignments or assignments column only
trans-unit.target: Input dataset appended by data column of assignments or assignments column only

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of module errors, see <link xlink:href="60822377-da7a-40b8-aec7-d185d1509344" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Error codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For a complete list of module errors, see <link xlink:href="60822377-da7a-40b8-aec7-d185d1509344" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Error codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Exception occurs if one or more of inputs are null or empty.
trans-unit.target: Exception occurs if one or more of inputs are null or empty.
